questions.question: What is the main purpose of Hybrid payment architecture?
options: To combine free tier sponsorship with user-paid upgrades
To force all users to pay

questions.question: In Hybrid architecture, free tier users never need to connect a wallet.
What does the decision engine in Hybrid architecture determine?
options: Whether to use treasury sponsorship or user payment

questions.question: Hybrid architecture requires tracking user _____ to determine when they've exceeded free tier limits.
What happens when a free tier user exceeds their quota but has no wallet connected?
options: Upload is blocked and user is prompted to upgrade

questions.question: Pro tier users in Hybrid architecture always pay for their own storage.
Why must quota checks be atomic with uploads?
options: To prevent race conditions that could exceed limits

questions.question: What should happen if the treasury balance drops critically low in Hybrid architecture?
options: Implement graceful degradation by denying sponsorship
Delete user data to free funds

questions.question: Hybrid architecture requires maintaining two SDK contexts: one for treasury and one for user wallet.
What is the key economic insight of Hybrid architecture?
options: Commoditize the basics while monetizing scale
Free tier should have no limits
Treasury should cover all costs forever
